languages.text: Applies Staggered and increases Shock damage taken by 20% per stack.

traits.locale_text: Applies Staggered and increases Shock damage taken by 20% per stack.

languages.text: The creature is {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}. Additionally, each stack increases {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} suffered by +20%.

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけられた{/g}。各スタックは、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を+20%増加する。
languages.original_text: The creature is {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}. Additionally, each stack increases {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} suffered by +20%.

traits.locale_text: この生き物は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけられた{/g}。各スタックは、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を+20%増加する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Ошеломляет{/g} существо и увеличивает получаемый им {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрический урон{/g} на 20% за каждый уровень эффекта.
languages.original_text: The creature is {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}. Additionally, each stack increases {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} suffered by +20%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Ошеломляет{/g} существо и увеличивает получаемый им {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрический урон{/g} на 20% за каждый уровень эффекта.
{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Ошеломляет{/g} существо и увеличивает получаемый им {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрический урон{/g} на 20% за каждый уровень эффекта.

languages.text: Die Kreatur ist mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Wanken{/g} belegt. Außerdem erhöht jeder Stapel den erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} um +20 %.
languages.original_text: The creature is {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}. Additionally, each stack increases {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} suffered by +20%.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur ist mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Wanken{/g} belegt. Außerdem erhöht jeder Stapel den erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} um +20 %.

languages.text: Esta criatura sufre {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrio{/g}. Además, cada acumulación aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} que sufre en un +20 %.
languages.original_text: The creature is {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}. Additionally, each stack increases {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} suffered by +20%.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura sufre {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrio{/g}. Además, cada acumulación aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} que sufre en un +20 %.

languages.text: 此生物处于{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。此外，每层效果使其受到的{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}提高20%。
languages.original_text: The creature is {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}. Additionally, each stack increases {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} suffered by +20%.

traits.locale_text: 此生物处于{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。此外，每层效果使其受到的{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}提高20%。

languages.text: La créature subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}. De plus, chaque cumul augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} qui lui sont infligés de +20 %.

languages.text: Yaratık {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afalladı{/g}. Ayrıca her bir birikim, maruz kalınan {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}şok hasarını{/g} +%20 artırır.
